QuestData.Title: Vengeance Be Mine!
QuestData.Description: Only luck spared me from the same fate as me mates.$B$BIn the scurry I got knocked down - was a wee bit tipsy to begin with. Looked up ta see the first of 'em turn.$b$bThere was a big ol' fella watchin' with a whole mess o' guards. They were chantin' Ymiron... maybe killin' him will free me mates?
QuestData.LogDescription: Brigg in Utgarde Pinnacle wants you to kill King Ymiron.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ya find the one in charge here, $r? Did ya make 'em suffer?
QuestData.RewardText: Splendid! Mebbe now me mateys be able ta rest in peace.$b$bHere ya go, $g lad:lass;. Don't let it be said that ol' Brigg weren't generous ta those who showed 'im a kindness.$b$bGood doin' business wit yeh.
